casebody.data:
Thomas Tatum v. Commissioner of Correction (13732)

Lavery, Heiman and Schaller, Js.

Argued January 11 decision released February 7, 1995 James B. Streeto, special public defender, for the appellant (petitioner). Richard F. Jacobson, assistant state’s attorney, with whom, on the brief, were Donald A. Browne, state’s attorney, and Gerard P. Eisenman, assistant state’s attorney, for the appellee (respondent). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
